### Mission

The Finance Department’s role is to maximize the effective and efficient use of public funds through the implementation of internal controls and policies; follow directives and policies of our City Council and City Manager; build a unified team based on respect, trust, and mutual support.

### Overview

The Finance department has the fiduciary responsibility to safeguard the City's financial assets and manage its financial resources in accordance with the goals of the City Council, City Manager, and in compliance with applicable laws and generally accepted accounting and financial management principles.

The Finance Department is responsible for providing timely and accurate financial, operational and management information along with the coordination and implementation of related internal controls through a variety of functions, including:

Cash management  
Revenue collection  
Investment management  
Purchasing  
Payment processing  
Financial Systems  
Administration  
Grants accounting  
Financial reporting  
Budgetary control  
Debt management  
Accounts payable  
Fixed assets  
General accounting
